name: .GSV
summary: Learn about .GSV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GSV file in Grim Fandango (multiplatform). To do so, place the file in the directory your copy of the game uses to store save files (typically either ~/​LucasArts/​Grim Fandango or ~/​Doublefine/​GrimFandango). Then, open the game and load the save your GSV file contains.
